languages.text: "Действительно, мало ли существует вещей кроме технологий и познания, что важны техножрецам? Например, музыка или визиты вежливости…"

traits.locale_text: "Надо же, какая честь. Насколько я знаю, Идекс — цивилизованный мир гамма-класса. С чего бы им волноваться, кто греет трон феодального мира?"

languages.text: "Indeed. The Tech-Priests are famous for having many vocations outside of pursuing technology and discovering new knowledge. Like music, and visits of courtesy..."
languages.original_text: "Действительно, мало ли существует вещей кроме технологий и познания, что важны техножрецам? Например, музыка или визиты вежливости…"

traits.locale_text: "Indeed, the Tech-Priests are famous for having many vocations aside from pursuing technology and discovery of knowledge. Like music, and visits of courtesy..."
"Indeed, the Tech-Priests are famous for having many vocations aside from pursuing technology and discovery of knowledge. Like music, and visits of courtesy..."
"Indeed. The Tech-Priests are famous for having many vocations outside of pursuing technology and discovering new knowledge. Like music, and visits of courtesy..."
"Indeed. The Tech-Priests are famous for having many vocations outside of pursuing technology and discovering new knowledge. Like music, and visits of courtesy..."
"Indeed. The Tech-Priests are famous for having many vocations outside of pursuing technology and discovering new knowledge. Like music, and visits of courtesy..."
"Indeed. The Tech-Priests are famous for having many vocations outside of pursuing technology and discovering new knowledge. Like music, and visits of courtesy..."

languages.text: “确实如此，那些技术神甫除了追求技术、发掘知识之外，还有许许多多其他爱好。众所周知，他们热爱音乐，崇尚礼节，喜欢四处拜访……”
languages.original_text: "Indeed. The Tech-Priests are famous for having many vocations outside of pursuing technology and discovering new knowledge. Like music, and visits of courtesy..."

traits.locale_text: “确实如此，那些技术神甫除了追求技术、发掘知识之外，还有许许多多其他爱好。众所周知，他们热爱音乐，崇尚礼节，喜欢四处拜访……”

languages.text: «Sin duda. Los tecnosacerdotes son conocidos por profesar numerosas vocaciones aparte del dominio de la tecnología y el descubrimiento de nuevos conocimientos. Como la música, o las visitas de cortesía...».
languages.original_text: "Indeed. The Tech-Priests are famous for having many vocations outside of pursuing technology and discovering new knowledge. Like music, and visits of courtesy..."

traits.locale_text: «Sin duda. Los tecnosacerdotes son conocidos por profesar numerosas vocaciones aparte del dominio de la tecnología y el descubrimiento de nuevos conocimientos. Como la música, o las visitas de cortesía...».

languages.text: "Çok doğru. Tekno Rahipler, teknoloji peşinde koşmak ve yeni bilgiler keşfetmek dışında pek çok uğraşlarıyla da bilinir. Müzik ya da hürmet ziyaretleri gibi..."
languages.original_text: "Indeed. The Tech-Priests are famous for having many vocations outside of pursuing technology and discovering new knowledge. Like music, and visits of courtesy..."

traits.locale_text: "Çok doğru. Tekno Rahipler, teknoloji peşinde koşmak ve yeni bilgiler keşfetmek dışında pek çok uğraşlarıyla da bilinir. Müzik ya da hürmet ziyaretleri gibi..."

languages.text: 「確かに、技術司祭は、技術を追求したり新たな知識を発見したりするだけじゃなく、音楽とか、礼儀の訪問なんかでも有名なんだ…」
languages.original_text: "Indeed. The Tech-Priests are famous for having many vocations outside of pursuing technology and discovering new knowledge. Like music, and visits of courtesy..."

traits.locale_text: 「確かに、技術司祭は、技術を追求したり新たな知識を発見したりするだけじゃなく、音楽とか、礼儀の訪問なんかでも有名なんだ…」

languages.text: « En effet. Les technoprêtres sont réputés pour avoir d'autres vocations en dehors de la poursuite de la technologie et de nouvelles connaissances. Comme la musique, et les visites de courtoisie... »
languages.original_text: "Indeed. The Tech-Priests are famous for having many vocations outside of pursuing technology and discovering new knowledge. Like music, and visits of courtesy..."

traits.locale_text: « En effet. Les technoprêtres sont réputés pour avoir d'autres vocations en dehors de la poursuite de la technologie et de nouvelles connaissances. Comme la musique, et les visites de courtoisie... »

languages.text: "In der Tat. Die Techpriester sind berühmt dafür, neben der Technologie und der Entdeckung neuen Wissens noch viele weitere Berufungen zu haben. Musik, zum Beispiel, und Höflichkeitsbesuche ..."
languages.original_text: "Indeed. The Tech-Priests are famous for having many vocations outside of pursuing technology and discovering new knowledge. Like music, and visits of courtesy..."

traits.locale_text: "In der Tat. Die Techpriester sind berühmt dafür, neben der Technologie und der Entdeckung neuen Wissens noch viele weitere Berufungen zu haben. Musik, zum Beispiel, und Höflichkeitsbesuche ..."
